author: bago
msg: The previously deprecated JamesMBean is now implemented by LocalUsersRepository service
Now James.addUser is there only to satisfy the deprecated MailServer.addUser method and does no more has references to DefaultJamesUser (but simply delegates to LocalUsersRepository.addUser)
DefaultJamesUsers initializes itself automatically in the constructor (don't know why is was Initializable)
